executive_context.purpose: Diagnose whether zero is solely due to failover or if additional structural issues exist

tests.name: A8 ingestion health
tests.what: Verify last 7 days event counts by stream
tests.pass: Non-zero event flow per stream; no schema mismatch spikes

tests.name: SLO snapshot vs budget
tests.what: P95, error rate, queue depth, uptime; hourly spend vs $500 cap
tests.pass: P95<1.2s normal/<1.5s canary; error<1%; queue≤30; spend≤80%

tests.name: Suppression and gating footprint
tests.what: Share of traffic suppressed: under_13, no_consent, unsubscribed; cohort assignment
tests.pass: Suppression within historical bands; holdout near 10%±0.5pp

tests.name: Organic acquisition (SEO)
tests.what: Indexability audit: canonical, robots, sitemap, schema.org, page load, lighthouse, 404/500
tests.pass: Indexable pages, no noindex, CWV LCP<2.5s @75th, 0 major crawl errors

tests.name: Traffic attribution integrity
tests.what: Sessions by source/medium/UTM; landing-page to event linkage
tests.pass: ≥95% sessions carry source/medium; UTMs resolve to A8 sessions

tests.name: Activation funnel integrity
tests.pass: Each step records events; benchmarks met

tests.name: Payments readiness (B2C)
tests.what: Stripe mode, errors, purchase counts, refund rate
tests.pass: Live mode; non-zero success in historical; refund<2% and ≤baseline+0.25pp

tests.name: Provider activity and value
tests.what: Logins/session length; tasks created/completed; TTR; acceptance rate

tests.name: Provider acquisition funnel
tests.pass: >60% onboard completion; >40% posting; median TTR within baseline

tests.name: Compliance guardrails
tests.what: No student data in provider views during failover; audit log samples; PII checks

tests.name: Variant and control hygiene
tests.what: Allocation drift; correct messaging; event parity across A/B/control
tests.pass: Drift≤0.5pp; compliance text present; schemas consistent

tests.name: Incident and kill-trigger audit
tests.what: Kill events, near-misses, escalations; RCA presence

likely_root_causes: SEO pages not indexed or slow
requirements_to_kickoff: A8 read access for events and dashboards
Current baselines for SLOs, acceptance, and key funnel rates

delivery.includes: executive recommendation on where to invest first
